title: Officer1.Intro
body:
<<SetAnimParameterBool SceneHandler Officer_Uniformed_2 IsTalking 1>>
Good to see you Detective
->Hey how're the kids?
    I don't have children.
    ->The wife?
        Not married.
        ->Dog?
            Nope.
            ->Drinking problem?
                4 years sober.
                ->Well. This is awkward.
                    Yup.
->What have we got here?
The victim's name is Jacob Wright. Some businessman-type.
The body is upstairs in his apartment. We've kept anyone from entering it.
...The apartment I mean.
Two witnesses are down here. The door-man, named Kyle Gordon, and a cleaning lady called Lola Austin.
We're detaining them until you're done here.
<<SetAnimParameterBool SceneHandler Officer_Uniformed_2 IsTalking 0>>
